Class LivenessPageComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelperImpl
      org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
          org.smartfrog.services.www.LivenessPageComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
WaitForPageImpl
public class LivenessPageComponent
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
implements LivenessPage, org.smartfrog.sfcore.workflow.conditional.Condition

Initial liveness component. The initial implementation does a liveness check every sfPing, and only every sfPing(); a revision would run the checks in a separate thread at its own rate and then report errors. That revision could cache information about the GET with remote access, too. created 21-Apr-2004 13:46:23

public void sfStart()
             throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Can be called to start components. Subclasses should override to provide functionality Do not block in this call, but spawn off any main loops!
